results.content: Es demasiado básico para usar codeigniter, no se hace uso de ninguna buena practica de programación, todo el código que veo hasta ahora esta muy desordenado. Se nota que el curso es muy improvisado y el instructor ha hecho solo lo necesario para cumplir con un mantenimiento. No lo recomiendo en absoluto.

results.content: Very nice course to get you started on the road of developing web applications. Just that there isn't much explanation about the errors that occur and how to fix them
results.content_html: Very nice course to get you started on the road of developing web applications. Just that there isn't much explanation about the errors that occur and how to fix them

results.content: lots of mistakes (syntax errors) while coding which gave me a hard time, but it will teach you the basics of CodeIgniter generally. It would also be better if the instructor added form validations in the course.

results.content:
I learned a lot in this course. It is surely worth taking to practice codeigniter and ajax. 

My  only criticism is the sound. I had trouble hearing and the instructor seems to mumble. In some places explanations need to be more detailed.
 As a newbie to Jquery, I had never heard of datatables. So that was very nice to see.
results.content_html:
I learned a lot in this course. It is surely worth taking to practice codeigniter and ajax.

My only criticism is the sound. I had trouble hearing and the instructor seems to mumble. In some places explanations need to be more detailed.
As a newbie to Jquery, I had never heard of datatables. So that was very nice to see.

results.content: Information is very good. Instructor is knowledgeable but tends to fumble through the code quite a bit. He is also very hard to understand at times and the audio quality is quite poor. Still worthwhile if you know PHP, HTML and Javascript already. Good primer on CodeIgniter.
results.content_html: Information is very good. Instructor is knowledgeable but tends to fumble through the code quite a bit. He is also very hard to understand at times and the audio quality is quite poor. Still worthwhile if you know PHP, HTML and Javascript already. Good primer on CodeIgniter.

results.content: I think this teacher knows his subject. Nevertheless, this course isn't for beginners at all. You must have a good knowledge of CodeIgniter. In addition to he didn't know the framework as well as I expect. A few approximation remains with his code. Good teacher.
results.content_html: I think this teacher knows his subject. Nevertheless, this course isn't for beginners at all. You must have a good knowledge of CodeIgniter. In addition to he didn't know the framework as well as I expect. A few approximation remains with his code. Good teacher.
